Join a yoga class or a meditation group
start a gratitude journal to write down three things they are grateful for each day
attend a self-improvement workshop or seminar, such as Tony Robbins' "Unleash the Power Within"
take up a new hobby or creative pursuit, such as painting, photography, or writing
start a daily exercise routine, such as running, cycling, or weightlifting
try a new healthy recipe and cook it from scratch
join a community service project or volunteer for a cause they care about
plan a weekend getaway to a nature retreat or spa
practice self-care rituals such as taking a warm bath, getting a massage, or practicing a skincare routine
